sub_topic: Probability of a certain type of financial fraud occurring in a company
message_1: A certain financial fraud occurs in 3% of companies that have less than 20 employees. If a company has 15 employees, what is the probability that it will become a victim of this type of fraud?
message_2: The problem states that the financial fraud occurs in 3% of companies that have less than 20 employees. Since the company in question has 15 employees, which is less than 20, the probability that it will become a victim of this type of fraud is 3%.
